keyword: how many calories in miller light
title: How Many Calories in Miller Lite?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in Miller Lite per 12 oz serving, plus carbs, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations like bottle size.
h1: How Many Calories in Miller Lite?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz can of Miller Lite light lager beer, chilled, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, serving size, and brand specifics; alcohol content affects totals. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz Miller Lite has 96 kcal, mostly from 3.2 g carbs, with low protein and zero fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Compare to regular Miller High Life (per 12 oz)
Mix with diet soda (zero-cal mixer, 4 oz)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Miller Lite?
What are the carbs in Miller Lite?
faqs.a: About 3.2 g total carbs per 12 oz, with 0 g fiber and sugars.

faqs.q: Does Miller Lite have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimal: 0.7 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: How does Miller Lite compare to other light beers?
faqs.a: Similar to Bud Light (95 kcal) or Coors Light (102 kcal) per 12 oz.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Miller Lite?
faqs.a: Low at 10 mg per 12 oz serving.
